text: Noyant-et-Aconin is a former commune. It is in the region Hauts-de-France in the Aisne department in the north of France. In 2006, about 465 lived there. On 1 January 2023, it was merged into the new commune of Bernoy-le-Ch√¢teau. == References == Category:Former communes in Aisne
title: Noyant-et-Aconin
